name: Vaccine Appointment Notifier
description: Airtable + Python + Cron to subscribe to vaccine appointments in your zip codes

AIRTABLE_API_KEY.description: API key from your Airtable account

VACCINE_MAX_MILES.description: Max number of miles you want to consider from each zip code you're tracking

VACCINE_MAX_MINUTES.description: Max number of minutes before you'll consider appointment information out-dated
